idea:
Ayuriam.com envisages to become the preferred number one go to for anything Ayurvedic be it products or treatments, thus becoming a marketplace or as we like to term it one big family as we firmly believe in Vasudaivo Kutumbakam (The Whole World is One Family). We want Happiness for All by taking a holistic approach to our family members health which we have realised over the past year is the true wealth. We plan to achieve this by offering the best products and treatments led by panel of expert advisory board members who bring rich experience in their chosen fields. Founded by Prasanna Vinod Thakkar who has been associated with the Health and Fitness Industry since 30 plus years. Apart from being a Certified Personal Trainer/Gym Instructor and Aerobics Instructor and now a volunteer with Art of Living assisting senior Teachers with their Workshops. Because of his strong network across India and UAE/GCC because of his company Indian Properties which was instrumental in representing

 A Grade developers like Rustomjee, Godrej Properties, Tata Housing & Ajmera, etc. and still advises Developers for International Sales. Having rich experience of 10 years in Dubai we want to leverage it to achieving Loka Samastha Sukhino Bhavantu (Let the Whole World be Peaceful/Happy and Healthy) by giving value to our Ayuriam Family Members. We invite you to become a part of the Ayuriam Family and progress togather (Sanghachadwam).
name: Ayuriam

idea:
We would like to introduce PETROINOX PIPES AND TUBES PRIVATE LIMITED a professional Manufacturer and Exporter of Austenitic, Ferritic, Duplex Stainless Steel & Nickel Alloys Pipes, Tubes and U-Tubes. Our management style has been the key to our success as we delegate responsibility to the specific need of each and every customer. Every member from management, managers to workers each is encouraged to achieve highest performance in quality & service resulting total Customer Satisfaction.

Petroinox Pipes & Tubes draws its strength from its technical excellence and a team of highly qualified, well experienced workforce, who strive to make high quality products in a professionally managed environment with transparency, to maintain long terms business relations with its customers.

PETROINOX PIPES AND TUBES PRIVATE LIMITED has obtained all important Certificates like ISO 9001:2015 , PED CE 2014/68/EU, ISO 14000;15001 OHSAS 18001: 2017.


A rigorous system of quality management is in place to ensure that each manufactured products conforms to International standards of excellence. Quality assurance is the threshold of all the activities and stringent quality control measures are applied to all kind of In-house testing facilities like Chemical & Mechanical testing, Bright & Solution Annealing, PMI, Hydrostatic testing, Eddy Current testing, Hardness testing, Impact testing, Air under water test etc.

As a testimony of our relentless efforts in satisfying the client’s need, we have retained by various clients across industries like Refineries & Petrochemicals, Oil & Gas, Offshore, Chemicals & Fertilizers, Cement, Engineering, Pharmaceutical, Medical, Construction, Sugar, Nuclear & Thermal Power Plants etc.
name: PETROINOX PIPES & TUBES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ATS is into the business of providing low cost ERP solutions for Schools & Institutions. We provide digital interface for Management, Teachers/Professors/Instructors, Staff, Students and Parents. ATS has tried to digitalize the school system by creating various modules like Attendance, Exams, Mark sheets, Notifications, Circulars, Events, Holidays, Transport, Fees, Online Assessment, Online Exams, Live Webinars, Recorded Lectures, Recorded Notes and various other modules. ATS intends to take state of the art technology to every student near and far. Education in birth right of every child. Our dream to to provide rich content and technology to every student in achieving their dreams. The only constant thing is change. ATS thrives to bring on new modules in very new version. We intend to bring acquire data on Student analytics wherein behavioural patterns like sleep habits, eating habits, playing habits, interactive skills will be psychologically and graphically monitored. This will help parents and teachers to positively analyze a student’s progress or regress.

ATS provides the following services by considering the convenience of the student, teachers and school staff

1. ATS has come out with Digital solution with/without RFID technology. If the student has opted for a RFID card, attendance will be automatically marked by receiving machines at the school gates.

2. ATS help teachers upload daily lesson schedule for respective class/div/subject

3. Digital Homework/Assignment

4. ATS has come out with its own platform wherein the teachers can impart online lectures on any platform of their choice.

5. Subjective and objective online exam module

6. Automation in marks input benefiting of automation in mark sheet generation.

7. Creation of timetable matrix of subjects

8. Liberty of checking notes anytime and anywhere on the digital platform
name: AYYAN TECH-EDU SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: AJMERI FILM POWER INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED is an innovative company involving in the Doorstep Diesel Delivery. dealing in the delivery of Diesel to the door step of the customers who run heavy vehicles, agricultural machinery, We are venturing into the business of Mobile Fuel Dispenser to delivery Diesel (HSD) to Businesses which follow traditional ways of fueling their machinery. The concept of door step diesel delivery is novel in our area of business and will help us generate employment. We will hire trained drivers, operators, admin, security staff to run the business. We envision to create at least 20-25 jobs in the first tow years of setup.
name: AJMERI FILM POWER INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
